transcript.title: Interview with John Miller and Ross Davie, Radio 4BC
transcript.content:
JOURNALIST:

Prime Minister, good morning.

PRIME MINISTER:

Good morning John. Good to be with you.

JOURNALIST:

Good morning Mr Howard.

PRIME MINISTER:

G'day.

JOURNALIST:

Mr Howard, earlier on in the programme today the Premier of Queensland Peter Beattie, who as you'd know along with Bob Carr is one of the most successful Labor politicians in the country, said to us that unless this whole Labor leadership issue is sorted out, to quote him he said
